title: Action
description: The Action document is what is sent to an Action endpoint, to trigger a service or transaction. The Parameters can be inserted with data coming from an Action Descriptor or a web formed filled in by a user.

items.description: Compact JWS encoded Mandate used for the Action.

mandates.description: A list of Mandates used for the Action.

nonce.description: The nonce used for the Action to prevent replay attacks.

params.description: Additional parameters needed to perform the Action. It is up to the receiving controller to determine the use of the parameters.

items.description: Compact JWS encoded Fact used for the Action

facts.description: All shared facts needed to perform the Action.

contract.description: The signed Contract (compact encoded JWS) that was shown when the Action was signed.
